<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;NullTDTerm = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad957413955739c91204c96e33e0cc933">SplitBlockAndInsertIfThen</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NullTDCmp, &amp;&#42;IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, UnlikelyBW);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(NullTDTerm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NullTDTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;setName(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;set.type&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SetType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to check the type here. If the type is unknown, then the read</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sets the type. If the type is known, then it is checked. If the type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t match, then we call the runtime (which may yet determine that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the mismatch is okay).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The checks generated below have the following strucutre.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; First we load the descriptor for the load from shadow memory and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; compare it against the type descriptor for the current access type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %shadow.desc = load ptr %shadow.data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %bad.desc = icmp ne %shadow.desc, %td</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %bad.desc, %bad.bb, %good.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bad.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %shadow.desc.null = icmp eq %shadow.desc, null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %shadow.desc.null, %null.td.bb, %good.td.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// null.td.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; The typ is unknown, set it if all bytes in the value are also unknown.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; To check, we load the shadow data for all bytes of the access. For the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; pseudo code below, assume an access of size 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %shadow.data.int = add %shadow.data.int, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %l = load (inttoptr %shadow.data.int)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %is.not.null = icmp ne %l, null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %not.all.unknown = %is.not.null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %no.all.unknown, before.set.type.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before.set.type.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; Call runtime to check mismatch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @&#95;&#95;tysan&#95;check()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %set.type.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set.type.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; Now fill the remainder of the shadow memory corresponding to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; remainder of the the bytes of the type with a bad type descriptor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store %TD, %shadow.data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %continue.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// good.td.bb::</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ; We have a non-trivial mismatch. Call the runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @&#95;&#95;tysan&#95;check()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %continue.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// good.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ; We appear to have the right type. Make sure that all other bytes in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ; the type are still marked as interior bytes. If not, call the runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %shadow.data.int = add %shadow.data.int, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %l = load (inttoptr %shadow.data.int)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %not.all.interior = icmp sge %l, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %not.all.interior, label %check.rt.bb, label %continue.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  check.rt.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @&#95;&#95;tysan&#95;check()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br %continue.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aac2f0a84dd2aa5ee4c3f1385e9565f5e">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfab74797a67aabe2a47afe04d0a92997a0">Flags</a> = ConstantInt::get(OrdTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(IsRead) | (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(IsWrite) &lt;&lt; 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;LoadedTD = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab73bb6948312ca0f98055c6a74c37045">getPtrTy</a>(), ShadowData, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;shadow.desc&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(MismatchTerm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab086c5b9f9563eda0cdd703f454e041e">CreateCall</a>(TysanCheck, &#123;IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a932f08e32ea37a7019902ee467beb268">CreateBitCast</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab73bb6948312ca0f98055c6a74c37045">getPtrTy</a>()), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"></CodeLine>
